description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，曾参与同盟会、中华革命党，后成为国民党重要成员，并加入改组派。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure, who participated in the Tongmenghui and the Chinese Revolutionary Party, later becoming a key member of the Kuomintang and joining the Reorganization Faction.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，王法勤早年曾在此留学。
description.en: An East Asian country where Wang Faqin studied in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年直隶省的议事机构。
description.en: The consultative assembly of Zhili province in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山领导的中国近代革命组织，国民党的前身。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary organization led by Sun Yat-sen, the predecessor of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1912年在中国大陆成立的共和制国家。
description.en: A republican state established in mainland China in 1912.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山创立的中国政党，王法勤是其早期重要成员。
description.en: A Chinese political party founded by Sun Yat-sen, of which Wang Faqin was an early and important member.

en: First National Assembly of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年的最高立法机关。
description.en: The supreme legislative body in the early years of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1913年孙中山及国民党人发动的反对袁世凯的军事行动。
description.en: A 1913 military campaign launched by Sun Yat-sen and members of the Kuomintang against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、革命家，中华民国和中国国民党的缔造者。
description.en: A modern Chinese statesman and revolutionary, founder of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 国民党在二次革命失败后由孙中山改组而成的革命组织。
description.en: A revolutionary organization formed by Sun Yat-sen by reorganizing the Kuomintang after the failure of the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山等人为维护《中华民国临时约法》而发动的一系列斗争。
description.en: A series of struggles launched by Sun Yat-sen and others to uphold the Provisional Constitution of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1924年中国国民党召开的第一次全国代表大会。
description.en: The first national congress of the Kuomintang, held in 1924.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央执行委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会
en: Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在1924年至1993年间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The supreme authority of the Kuomintang from 1924 to 1993.

nodes.id: 中华民国陆海军大元帅大本营

zh-cn: 中华民国陆海军大元帅大本营

description.zh-cn: 孙中山在广州设立的护法军政府。
description.en: The military government established by Sun Yat-sen in Guangzhou to protect the constitution.

description.zh-cn: 1926年中国国民党召开的第二次全国代表大会。
description.en: The second national congress of the Kuomintang, held in 1926.

description.zh-cn: 1927年中国国民党第二届中央执行委员会第三次全体会议。
description.en: The 3rd Plenary Session of the 2nd Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang in 1927.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央政治委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央政治委员会
en: Central Political Council of the Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 国民党中央党政的最高决策指导机构。
description.en: The supreme decision-making and guiding body for the party and government affairs of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1927年存在于武汉的国民政府，由国民党左派及中国共产党成员组成。
description.en: A nationalist government that existed in Wuhan in 1927, composed of the KMT left-wing and members of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央商民部

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央商民部

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会下设的部门之一，负责商民运动。
description.en: One of the departments under the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang, responsible for the merchant and citizen movement.

nodes.id: 国民党中央政治会议北平政治分会

zh-cn: 国民党中央政治会议北平政治分会

description.zh-cn: 国民党中央政治会议在北平设立的分支机构。
description.en: The Beiping branch of the Central Political Council of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，国民党早期领导人之一，改组派领袖。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure, one of the early leaders of the Kuomintang, and the leader of the Reorganization Faction.

description.zh-cn: 国民党内由汪精卫、陈公博领导的反对蒋介石的政治派别。
description.en: A political faction within the Kuomintang led by Wang Jingwei and Chen Gongbo that opposed Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，国民党改组派主要人物。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure and a key member of the Kuomintang's Reorganization Faction.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，国民党改组派主要人物。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure and a key member of the Kuomintang's Reorganization Faction.

nodes.id: 中国国民党改组同志会

zh-cn: 中国国民党改组同志会

description.zh-cn: 由国民党改组派成员成立的组织。
description.en: An organization founded by members of the Kuomintang's Reorganization Faction.

description.zh-cn: 国民党内负责抚恤相关事宜的委员会。
description.en: A committee within the Kuomintang responsible for pension and relief matters.

nodes.id: 国民党中央执行委员会常务委员

zh-cn: 国民党中央执行委员会常务委员
en: Standing Committee of the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会的常设机构，是国民党的核心决策层。
description.en: The standing body of the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang, serving as the core decision-making level of the party.

description.zh-cn: 早年曾赴日本留学，后辍学回国。
description.en: Studied in Japan in his early years, but later dropped out and returned to China.

position.zh-cn: 京津同盟会纠察部部长
position.en: Minister of the Disciplinary Department of the Beijing-Tianjin Tongmenghui
Deputy Head of the Zhili Branch

description.zh-cn: 在二次革命后追随孙中山。
description.en: Followed Sun Yat-sen after the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 参与成立中华革命党。
description.en: Participated in the founding of the Chinese Revolutionary Party.

description.zh-cn: 策划护法运动。
description.en: Planned the Constitutional Protection Movement.

description.zh-cn: 王法勤在国民党一大上当选国民党中央执行委员、北方执行部执行委员。
description.en: Wang Faqin was elected as a member of the Central Executive Committee and a member of the Northern Executive Department of the Kuomintang at the 1st National Congress.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆海军大元帅大本营

description.zh-cn: 王法勤在国民党二大上继续出任中央执行委员。
description.en: Wang Faqin continued to serve as a member of the Central Executive Committee at the 2nd National Congress of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 王法勤在国民党二届三中全会上当选中央政治委员会委员。
description.en: Wang Faqin was elected as a member of the Central Political Council at the 3rd Plenary Session of the 2nd Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang.

relationships.target: 中国国民党中央商民部

position.en: Minister of the Central Merchants Department, Minister of Labor

relationships.target: 国民党中央政治会议北平政治分会

description.zh-cn: 王法勤加入了由汪精卫领导的国民党改组派。
description.en: Wang Faqin joined the Reorganization Faction of the Kuomintang, led by Wang Jingwei.

description.zh-cn: 加入追随汪精卫的改组派。
description.en: Joined the Reorganization Faction that followed Wang Jingwei.

relationships.target: 中国国民党改组同志会
中国国民党改组同志会
中国国民党改组同志会
中国国民党中央执行委员会

description.zh-cn: 在国民党一大、二大以及第四届、第五届全国代表大会后均当选为中央执行委员。1924年同时担任北方执行部执行委员。
description.en: Was elected as a member of the Central Executive Committee after the 1st, 2nd, 4th, and 5th National Congresses of the Kuomintang. Also served as a member of the Northern Executive Department in 1924.

relationships.target: 中国国民党中央政治委员会
国民党中央执行委员会常务委员

description.zh-cn: 同为国民党改组派成员，并共同创立中国国民党改组同志会。
description.en: Were both members of the Kuomintang's Reorganization Faction and co-founded the Society of Comrades for the Reorganization of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 同为国民党改组派成员，并共同创立中国国民党改组同志会。
description.en: Were both members of the Kuomintang's Reorganization Faction and co-founded the Society of Comrades for the Reorganization of the Kuomintang.
